relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/rubs/gallops.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, tenderness to palpation in right lower quadrant, no rebound or guarding. Surgical scars in midline and right subcostal area, no masses or hernias.
relevant_findings.extremities: Right lower extremity with scaling and erythematous rash over knee and distal thigh without blistering, no edema.
